languages.text: Призрак старца Вени'Заккари, что не упокоился с миром, стоял подле Домин. Раны, терзавшие его душу, были глубоки, но не было в нем злобы на Домин — ибо рукой Домин было свершено наказание, коего искал почтенный Вени для себя.

The ghost of old Veni'Zacchary, who did not rest in peace, stood by the Domin's side. Deep and painful as his soul's wounds were, he bore the Domin no ill will: for the old Veni had himself sought the punishment the Domin had exacted upon him.
languages.original_text: Призрак старца Вени'Заккари, что не упокоился с миром, стоял подле Домин. Раны, терзавшие его душу, были глубоки, но не было в нем злобы на Домин — ибо рукой Домин было свершено наказание, коего искал почтенный Вени для себя.

traits.locale_text: The ghost of old Oa'Weisz, who did not rest in peace, stood by the Enim's side. Deep and painful as his soul's wounds were, he bore the Enim no ill-will: for the venerable Oa had himself sought the punishment the Enim had exacted upon him.

The ghost of old Oa'Weisz, who did not rest in peace, stood by the Enim's side. Deep and painful as his soul's wounds were, he bore the Enim no ill-will: for the venerable Oa had himself sought the punishment the Enim had exacted upon him.

The ghost of old Oa'Weisz, who did not rest in peace, stood by the Enim's side. Deep and painful as his soul's wounds were, he bore the Enim no ill will: for the venerable Oa had himself sought the punishment the Enim had exacted upon him.

The ghost of old Oa'Weisz, who did not rest in peace, stood by the Enim's side. Deep and painful as his soul's wounds were, he bore the Enim no ill will: for the venerable Oa had himself sought the punishment the Enim had exacted upon him.

The ghost of old Veni'Zacchary, who did not rest in peace, stood by the Domin's side. Deep and painful as his soul's wounds were, he bore the Domin no ill will: for the old Veni had himself sought the punishment the Domin had exacted upon him.

The ghost of old Veni'Zacchary, who did not rest in peace, stood by the Domin's side. Deep and painful as his soul's wounds were, he bore the Domin no ill will: for the old Veni had himself sought the punishment the Domin had exacted upon him.

languages.text: Der Geist des alten Veni'Zacchary, der nicht in Frieden ruhen konnte, stand an der Seite {mf|des|der} Domin. So tief und schmerzhaft die Wunden seiner Seele auch waren, er hegte keinen Groll gegen {mf|den|die} Domin: Denn der alte Veni hatte sich die Strafe, die {mf|der|die} Domin ihm auferlegt hatte, selbst gewünscht.
languages.original_text: The ghost of old Veni'Zacchary, who did not rest in peace, stood by the Domin's side. Deep and painful as his soul's wounds were, he bore the Domin no ill will: for the old Veni had himself sought the punishment the Domin had exacted upon him.

traits.locale_text: Der Geist des alten Veni'Zacchary, der nicht in Frieden ruhen konnte, stand an der Seite {mf|des|der} Domin. So tief und schmerzhaft die Wunden seiner Seele auch waren, er hegte keinen Groll gegen {mf|den|die} Domin: Denn der alte Veni hatte sich die Strafe, die {mf|der|die} Domin ihm auferlegt hatte, selbst gewünscht.

languages.text: El fantasma del viejo Veni'Zacchary, que no descansaba en paz, se hallaba junto a{mf|l| la} Domin. Aunque las heridas de su alma eran profundas y dolorosas, no guardaba rencor alguno contra {mf|el|la} Domin: a fin de cuentas, el viejo Veni había pedido el castigo proporcionado por {mf|el|la} Domin.
languages.original_text: The ghost of old Veni'Zacchary, who did not rest in peace, stood by the Domin's side. Deep and painful as his soul's wounds were, he bore the Domin no ill will: for the old Veni had himself sought the punishment the Domin had exacted upon him.

traits.locale_text: El fantasma del viejo Veni'Zacchary, que no descansaba en paz, se hallaba junto a{mf|l| la} Domin. Aunque las heridas de su alma eran profundas y dolorosas, no guardaba rencor alguno contra {mf|el|la} Domin: a fin de cuentas, el viejo Veni había pedido el castigo proporcionado por {mf|el|la} Domin.

languages.text: 安らかな眠りにない老ヴェニ・ザカリーの亡霊がドミンのそばに立っていた。その魂の傷は深く、痛ましいものであったが、ドミンに悪意は持っていなかった。由緒正しきヴェニは、ドミンが自身に下す罰を求めていたからだ。
languages.original_text: The ghost of old Veni'Zacchary, who did not rest in peace, stood by the Domin's side. Deep and painful as his soul's wounds were, he bore the Domin no ill will: for the old Veni had himself sought the punishment the Domin had exacted upon him.

traits.locale_text: 安らかな眠りにない老ヴェニ・ザカリーの亡霊がドミンのそばに立っていた。その魂の傷は深く、痛ましいものであったが、ドミンに悪意は持っていなかった。由緒正しきヴェニは、ドミンが自身に下す罰を求めていたからだ。

languages.text: 帷者扎卡里无法安息的幽灵站在了秘者身边。尽管他的灵魂遭到了深切的创伤，但他对秘者没有任何恶意，因为这位年迈的帷者受到的惩罚，是他亲口请求秘者施予的。
languages.original_text: The ghost of old Veni'Zacchary, who did not rest in peace, stood by the Domin's side. Deep and painful as his soul's wounds were, he bore the Domin no ill will: for the old Veni had himself sought the punishment the Domin had exacted upon him.

traits.locale_text: 帷者扎卡里无法安息的幽灵站在了秘者身边。尽管他的灵魂遭到了深切的创伤，但他对秘者没有任何恶意，因为这位年迈的帷者受到的惩罚，是他亲口请求秘者施予的。

languages.text: Le spectre du vieux Veni'Zacchary, qui ne reposait pas en paix, se tint aux côtés {mf|du|de la} Domin. Aussi profondes et douloureuses que soient les blessures de son âme, il n'en voulait pas {mf|au|à la} Domin, car le vénérable Veni avait lui-même cherché à subir le châtiment que {mf|le|la} Domin lui avait infligé.
languages.original_text: The ghost of old Veni'Zacchary, who did not rest in peace, stood by the Domin's side. Deep and painful as his soul's wounds were, he bore the Domin no ill will: for the old Veni had himself sought the punishment the Domin had exacted upon him.

traits.locale_text: Le spectre du vieux Veni'Zacchary, qui ne reposait pas en paix, se tint aux côtés {mf|du|de la} Domin. Aussi profondes et douloureuses que soient les blessures de son âme, il n'en voulait pas {mf|au|à la} Domin, car le vénérable Veni avait lui-même cherché à subir le châtiment que {mf|le|la} Domin lui avait infligé.

languages.text: İhtiyar Veni'Zacchary'nin huzur içinde uykuya dalamayan hayaleti, Domin'in yanında yer aldı. Ruhundaki yaralar derinlere işleyip acı verse de Domin'e karşı kin beslemiyordu. Çünkü ihtiyar Veni'Zacchary, Domin'in kendisine verdiği cezayı bizzat talep etmişti.
languages.original_text: The ghost of old Veni'Zacchary, who did not rest in peace, stood by the Domin's side. Deep and painful as his soul's wounds were, he bore the Domin no ill will: for the old Veni had himself sought the punishment the Domin had exacted upon him.
